long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This PlugIn will be used by the users who have access to  Aplos website ( https://www.aplos.com ),  After the users are logged in to the Aplos WebSite. Using this plug in, they can do internal transfer of funds. This plug in helps Aplos users to speed up their work, without this plugin, it takes days to complete the work. This Plug In works and does the work for them.
